content: They both crowded around my phone to see my Minecraft find. My husband and I have spent the last few nights halfheartedly listening to the TV as we donned iron armor and tentatively explored the pixelated mine. Zombies, Skeleton Archers, and Spiders have attempted to ruin our ore gathering, but we battled them together and dumped buckets of water on each other’s heads when we accidentally fell in lava.
